title: Kan velah buh lak tur tam tak a hmin ta e
lyrics:
Kan velah buh lak tur tam tak a hmin ta e,
Anmahni at turinkal la;
Lalpan a pui ang che,
I chakna ring lovin,
Lalpa chakna chu ring zel ang che.
I chi theh a to vang,
Lalpan a pui ang che;
Chatuan hmun i thlenpui theihna tur,
I chak lai hian thawk la,
Lalpa chakna ringin.

I thawh loh avangin tam tak an boral e,
Lalpa hmangaihte an ral mek;
Anni pui turin i kal ang em?
Puitu an ngai em em,
An boral zawh hma hian.
Kal thuai la, va thawk rawh,
An tan ni a kiam e;
Thlarau chhiar sen loh boral tur chu,
I hmangaih lo vem ni?
Pakhat tal rawn hruai rawh.

Dak chhuak la, en vel teh, tlanna hre lote hi,
Lalpan a tlan chu an hre lo;
Muang takin an la thu,
Hruaitu turin tu mah an awm lo,
Chhandamtu an hre lo.
Anmahni hruai turin,
Lalpain a duh che;
Eng tik nge Isua hma an kun ang,
An Tlantu
tih hriain,
A lalna hming fakin?
